message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CY, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with fairness in the context of multi-armed bandit (MAB) decision making, which is a problem commonly studied in the machine learning community. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also involves probability theory and optimization, which are relevant to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.CY (Computational Complexity). Finally, the paper discusses fairness in decision making, which is related to game theory, making cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory) a possible sub-category as well.
